_meanings:
{@--1@} ({%a%}) Cutting off or
asunder, tearing off; <ls>Bh. 3. 11.</ls>
({%b%}) Breaking off, fracture.

{@--5@} Colouring the body with
paints and unguents, painting 
colours, rouge; {#vicCittiSezEH surasuMdarIRAM#}
<ls>Ś. 7. 5</ls>; <ls>Śi. 16. 84.</ls>

{@--7@} A
pause in a verse, cæsura.

{@--8@} A 
particular kind of amorous gesture,
consisting in carelessness in dress
and decoration (through pride of
personal beauty);  
{#stokApyAkalparacanA vicCittiH kAMtipozakft#} <ls>S. D. 138.</ls>
